TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ControlUpdateMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Determines when changes to a data source property get propagated up to the corresponding data-bound control property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlUpdateMode> is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.ControlUpdateMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class. OnPropertyChanged is the default value. To force a control update when the update mode is Never, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding.ReadValue%2A> method on the related <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ControlUpdateMode Never = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Control property is never updated. Binding is "write-only" with respect to the data source. To force the control property to be updated, use the Binding.ReadValue method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.ControlUpdateMode OnPropertyChanged = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Control property is updated whenever the data source property changes, or the data source position changes. This is the default update mode.
